attributes.action: create legislation that requires coathangers in shops to be shatterproof
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our daughter sustained a serious eye injury and nearly lost her right eye altogether after a coathanger snapped in half. The sharp end that snapped off hit her in the eye causing severe damage. 14 months later she still has virutally no vision in her right eye.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create legislation that requires coathangers in shops to be shatterproof."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17870


Prime Minister's Office
